properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pigeon Point to Point Pinos 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 2:23PM PST until January 12 at 3:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 13 to 18 feet at 17 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Pigeon Point to Point Pinos 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 3 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY
